about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Infections Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Infections Package:

  • 14d M with tactile temperature
  • 8yo F ALL with Fever, Altered Mental Status
  • 42yo F with right arm pain
  • 3yo M with R sided limp
  • 22yo F with right lower quadrant pain
  • 19mo M with Febrile Seizure
  • 9yo F ALL with Fever
  • 46yo F with weakness in legs
  • 3yo M R sided limp
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Infections Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Infections Package:

  • 14d M with tactile temperature
  • 8yo F ALL with Fever, Altered Mental Status
  • 42yo F with right arm pain
  • 3yo M with R sided limp
  • 22yo F with right lower quadrant pain

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better
